death.attack.divine.player: %s was retconned after losing a fight with %s
death.attack.surface_tension: %s learned a painful lesson about surface tension
death.attack.surface_tension.player: %s was proven guilty of witchcraft by %s
death.attack.transmutation: %s was turned into an eldritch horror by %s
death.attack.transmutation.strong: %s was told the story of King Midas by %s
death.attack.waybomb: %s's aspects were annihilated at the hands of %s
death.attack.waybomb.accident: %s was vaporized when %s underwent alchemical fission
death.attack.waybomb.accident.item: %s was vaporized when %s underwent alchemical fission
death.attack.waybomb.item: %s's aspects were annihilated at the hands of %s
tip.aasb.herm.armor.desc.1: Provides enormous amounts of protection by absorbing damage
tip.aasb.herm.armor.desc.2: Protection decreases with more damage absorbed, regenerates over time
tip.aasb.herm.armor.desc.3: Will violently release all stored energy at once if it absorbs to much
tip.aasb.herm.armor.flavor: Become a living fortress with the infalliable Ultrashield
tip.aasb.herm.axe.desc: Press %s to quickly harvest all nearby tree blocks
tip.aasb.herm.axe.flavor: Turn forests into plains with the controversial Supercut
tip.aasb.herm.enchBonus.desc: Gains large boosts to base stats when enchanted, scaling with charge
tip.aasb.herm.hoe.flavor: Expedite landscaping with the useful Hypersickle
tip.aasb.herm.pickaxe.desc: Press %s to instantly collect all nearby ores
tip.aasb.herm.pickaxe.flavor: Make stripmining a breeze with the handy Proximine
tip.aasb.herm.shovel.desc: Press %s to violently excavate a large area
tip.aasb.herm.shovel.flavor: Level entire mountains with the arguably safe Areablast
tip.aasb.herm.sword.desc: Press %s to rapidly attack nearby creatures
tip.aasb.herm.sword.flavor: Decimate your foes with the powerful Autoslash
tip.aasb.herm.tool.enchBonus.flavor: Outclass everything else with the help of enchanting
tip.aasb.herm.tool.staticDig.desc: Dig Stabilizer is avaliable, allowing for precision block breaking
